featured.title: Featured Work
featured.subtitle: Discover our most beloved pieces, handcrafted with meticulous care and attention to detail. Each item tells its own story.

hero.title: About Our Craft
hero.subtitle: Every piece tells a story of passion, dedication, and the timeless art of pottery making.

story.title: Crafting Beauty, One Piece at a Time
story.text1: Welcome to our pottery studio, where tradition meets creativity. For over a decade, we've been dedicated to creating unique, handcrafted pieces that bring warmth and character to your home.
story.text2: Each piece begins as raw clay and is carefully shaped, glazed, and fired with attention to detail and a deep respect for the craft. We believe that pottery is more than just functional artâ€”it's a connection to centuries of tradition and a celebration of the handmade.
story.text3: Our studio is a place where creativity flows freely, where imperfections are celebrated as marks of authenticity, and where every piece carries the energy and intention of its creation.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our craft and inspire every piece we create.

value1.title: Handcrafted with Love
value1.description: Every piece is made by hand with care, attention to detail, and a deep passion for the craft. No two pieces are exactly alike, making each one truly unique.

value2.title: Sustainable Materials
value2.description: We source natural, eco-friendly materials and use sustainable practices in our studio. Our glazes are non-toxic and safe for everyday use.

value3.title: Personal Connection
value3.description: We love connecting with our customers and creating custom pieces that tell your story. Each commission is a collaboration and a joy to create.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: From clay to finished piece, each step is a labor of love.

step1.title: Design
step1.description: Every piece begins with an idea, sketched and refined until it's ready to create.

step2.title: Shaping
step2.description: Clay is carefully shaped by hand, taking form through skilled hands.

step3.title: Glazing
step3.description: Each piece is carefully glazed, choosing colors and finishes that enhance its beauty.

step4.title: Firing
step4.description: The kiln transforms raw clay into durable pottery, revealing the final colors and textures.

cta.title: Want to Learn More?
cta.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're interested in a custom piece, have questions about our process, or just want to say hello.

hero.subtitle: Have a question about our pottery or interested in a custom piece? We'd love to hear from you!

info.title: Contact Information
